definitions.body: poor, afflicted, humble, meek;—[[עָנׇו]] Nu 12:3 (Kt; Qr [[עָנׇיו]] is to ensure the [[]]—[[ָ]] acc. to Di Kö:ii. 1. 76); elsewh. pl. [[עֲנׇוִים]] Is 29:19 + 11 t. + Kt [[עֲנׇוִים]] Is 32:7, Ps 9:19 (Qr [[עֲנִיִּים]]); Qr [[עֲנׇוִים]] Ps 9:13, Ps 10:12, Pr 3:34, Pr 14:21, Pr 16:19 (Kt [[עניים]]); cstr. [[עַנְוֵי]] Zep 2:3 + 2 t., + Kt [[ענוי]] (Qr [[עֲנִיֵּי]]) Am 8:4 (so Job 24:4 van d. H.; but [[עֲנִיֵּי]] Kt and Qr Baer Ginsb)—these forms shew confusion with [[עָנִי]], which is perh. only another form of [[עָנׇו]] (otherwise Rahlfs:op. cit. 62 f. Dr:‘Poor’ in Hastings:DB; [[עָנׇו]] = humble, meek, [[עָנִי]] = pass. humbled, afflicted);—
poor and weak. oppressed by rich and powerful Am 2:7, Is 29:19, Is 32:7 (Kt); [[ארץ]]([[ה]])[[ענוי ]] Ps 76:10, Is 11:4, Zep 2:3, Am 8:4 (Kt), Job 24:4.
poor, weak and afflicted Israel (usu. rendered meek) Ps 10:17, Ps 22:27, Ps 25:9, Ps 25:9, Ps 34:3, Ps 37:11, Ps 69:33 ([[עָנִי]]
also in all these Psalm Psalm), Ps 147:6, Ps 149:4, Is 61:1 (‖[[נשׁברי לב]], cf. Is 66:2 [[עָנִי]]
